thread.title: Hunting Big Game in Chip Deals
thread.title_full: Hunting Big Game in Chip Deals - WSJ

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Hunting Big Game in Chip Deals
text:
Semiconductor companies thrive by making things smaller. But their deal makers are thinking much bigger these days.
Dialog Semiconductor announced a deal to buy Atmel Corp. over the weekend for $4.6 billion in cash and stock. That is just the latest in a string of multibillion-dollar transactions in the chip industry this year. These include Avago’s $37 billion tie-up with Broadcom and Intel’s pending $17 billion combination with... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
